import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import ProductCard from './ProductCard' import Api from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const TrendSlider = ({data}) => { const[TrendSliderdata,SetTrendSliderdata] =useState() const responsepayload ={ block_name: data.block_name, id: data.id } Api.post(endPoints.GET_HOME_PAGE_DATA,responsepayload).then((res)=>SetTrendSliderdata(res.data.data)).catch((err)=>console.log(first)) return (<>
